ovdesc.p: This application is used to maintain reconciliation details of the aggregated trades.

Records the reason for the rejection/reconciliation failure and any other narrative. The status could be:
NOREC: No Matching record found for the group based on details in incoming message
DIFFNOM: Quantity varies from the quantity in the incoming message
DIFFAMT: The amount varies from the amount in the incoming message
MTCHTOL:Status is matched but the amount in incoming message differs from the amount in Recon record but the difference is within tolerance specified
